name: Dar Par
text: Pizza hut has always been a great place to get a quick meal, but the last time I went there wow, it had new management(sorry to say they should have kept there old crew). Salad bar I would not feed a rabbit, old and slimmy lettuce, spills every where. Haven't been back..

name: Toni Valencia
text: Amazing service. Friendly, fast, and extremely courteous. Fresh baked warm pizza not some little caesar cardboard crust. Recommend it to anybody looking for some delicious pizza in beautiful Whitefish Montana!! A++++

name: Corby B.
text: Wonderful time here. Clean restaurant. Employees very helpful and funny. Food came Hot. Bread Sticks were PERFECT. Great Job.

name: Shally
text: Food was great and service was good for the most part. :) At first it was hard to tell about the service as our waiter was monotone and not smiling. But the other staff was nice.

name: Tillie Butts
text: Love Whitefish pizza hut. Great service and finally I got an on line offer that I could use on Gluten Free.

name: Sandra Mayert
text: Robyn and the crew are wonderful. She made the grandchildren lagh. There are 3 under 6 years old. Thank you so much pizza hut crew of whitefish you are all awesome!

name: plryan
text: Pizza Hut food here as good as any Pizza Hut, but the employee's make this place special. I dealt with a woman named Robin who was the nicest most courteous person I've ever dealt with in any restaurant. The Service Industry at large needs more Robin's, thank you!

name: Kyle Harper
text: This is an excellent Pizza Hut. The one where I live near St. Louis always skimps out on toppings. This place really dishes it out! I should have tried a sandwich since our restaurants don't offer this selection! Only complaint is this store doesn't offer the 10 dollar any pizza deal. Still, they uphold a great standard here.

name: Daniel Haave
text: I love my Pizza hut in whitefish, mt..l have had Pizza hut my whole life, all over the United states , and whitefish Pizza hut, in my home town, has always been the best.

name: Randy King
text: The Kalispell Montana Pizza Hut sucks they don't  seam to care about the customs and by the time I got my food it was cold because some of the employee's were talking to their family for hours when they should of been working or should of been sent home.

name: Stacy Shull
text: Im not sure how this place got the low review that it did.  I have been there twice and both of those visits were great.  On the second visit, I told the server I need a table where I can work.  He said no problem, and brought me to the …More

name: Steve Heinze
text: Good food and fast service. Great tasting wings.

name: Steven Krakowka
text: Food was not the best, the service however was fantastic

name: Barbara McLeod
text: If I could rate this zero stars I would. The customer service was appalling especially by the "manager" Heather. So rude and unhappy. There are so many places to get Pizza in whitefish with better customer service. I will not be giving my …More

name: Cora Roloff
text: Best service out of any pizza hut that I have ever been to. Everytime we eat there we leave very happy.

name: Tanner Marengo
text: Pizza hut pizza isn't my favorite, but the service was very good and the pizza was out quickly.

name: T Cuglietta
text: Place was packed when we got here people were so loud we almost left. But pizza was good, and once people left it was better. It's pizza hut, nothing special about this one though.

name: Deborah Causey
text: Pizza is always good here. Beer is always cold. Service is pretty quick inside and at the drive up window.

name: Randall a
text: They pick and choose what franchise special they are going to honor if any. I got the impression that they were doing me a favor by answering the phone. I am a local and this isnt the first bad experience with this establishment. Try 2nd street pizza instead.

name: Brittney Herman
text: The woman I just spoke too was completely and utterly rude. Can’t believe the “customer” service she tried to give me.

name: Gilbert Wilson
text: Typical Pizza Hut. The waitress was very helpful.

name: Josh Powell
text: Good food. But its not cheap.

name: Laurie Russell
text: Fun birthday party for Bella's 5th

name: Abbas Contractor
text: Nice experience. Good ambience

name: Amber Nestell
text: My bf works here and I've gotten know a lot of the pizzas and the brownies are to die for. Ugh so good!

name: Chris flint
text: Good pizza and vey friendly staff

name: Lance Zander
text: Clean. Have Robin wear her many different glasses for you.

name: David Yablonskiy
text: Highly unsatisfied with the customer service for delivery.  The lady over the phone was rude and condescending. The food took over an hour to get to me, when they told me it was going to be 20 minutes. Come on people, this is whitefish we should hold ourselves to a higher standard.

name: Joan Romo
text: Good food, nice salad bar!

name: Kelly Fitzpatrick
text: Pizza hut pizza is nothung to write home about. Service is adequate.

name: Doug Luehr
text: Very clean; pleasant employees

name: Eric Sonderman
text: If I wanted cardboard, I would have ordered a box.

name: Ryan Horn
text: Have you ever tried picking out the raisins from raisin bran cereal? I have somewhat the same experience every time I go here. They always put the wrong ingredients on my Pizza. Dang tease.

name: Steven Anders
text: Very good customer service

name: Martha Haug
text: We were very well taken care of by Robin...we were a large party of 21 and though we stressed her a little  (a lot) she made us all laugh as well as herself with her funny glasses!!  Thank you Robin from the Washingtonian's!!

name: Glen Foster
text: I had an online order where it wasn't confirmed and I had to go back to the restaurant to pick up the remaining part.

name: Chris Young
text: Garlic parmesan wings!! Yumm

name: Ken Hanks
text: Very friendly staff, great meal

name: Jordan Rendoni
text: Excellent customer service

name: Renee Stumpf
text: There ok

name: Cody Guy
text: Always good after a long day

name: Kent Saunders
text: Brought 9 people 3 of them got there food rest of the orders were wrong and after 45min still didnt have them

name: Mary Carver
text: Pizza was over cooked

name: Gary
text: Great service!!

name: Dino Hernandez
text: Quick and easy to get in and out

name: Lora Hansen
text: Good Food

name: ThanxALott
text: Would not honor advertised tv specials.

name: Carla Sullivan
text: Not a place I would recommend!!!! CUT BANK, MT.

name: Mary Hurley
text: Great Hawaiian pizza

name: travis h
text: Garbage in pizza form.

name: Fay Dowling
text: Typical Hut.

name: Johnny Lingle
text: Gave me runs. I won't go back.

name: Lea Taylor
text: Worst customer service ever, will not go back

name: Nico Brandes
text: Really tasty :)

name: JAVIER RODRIGUEZ
text:
(Translated by Google) The staff was not too friendly.
